translations: 陈词滥调；使用陈词滥调；平庸之人；平庸之物；[印刷] <主英>铅版，铅版印刷；电版，电版印刷物

sentences.sentence: To use a well-worn cliche, it is packed with information.
sentences.translation: 用一个套话来说，其内容充实。

sentences.sentence: An old cliche says time is money.
sentences.translation: 一句旧的陈词说时间就是金钱。

sentences.sentence: OK, time to put this business cliche back in the box now.
sentences.translation: 好吧，是时候把这个滥用语扫到语言的垃圾箱了。
